Installation
============

Install from PyPI
-----------------

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install pymlb-statsapi

Install with uv (recommended)
------------------------------

.. code-block:: bash

   uv add pymlb-statsapi

From Source
-----------

.. code-block:: bash

   git clone https://github.com/power-edge/pymlb_statsapi.git
   cd pymlb_statsapi
   uv sync
